subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A prodigy at 19, a star at 25 and a backup at 31, Andruw Jones is now the 33-year-old right-handed-hitting reserve corner outfielder in the Bronx.
snippet: A prodigy at 19, a star at 25 and a backup at 31, Andruw Jones is now the 33-year-old right-handed-hitting reserve corner outfielder in the Bronx.
